snippet: Stocks in the United States and Europe fell and borrowing costs soared for some of the euro zone’s most indebted members.
abstract: Market enthusiasm over the Spanish bank bailout fades quickly; stocks in the United States and Europe fall and borrowing costs soar for some of the euro zone’s most indebted members.

byline.original: By CHRISTINE HAUSER and DAVID JOLLY

lead_paragraph: Stocks in the United States and Europe fell and borrowing costs soared for some of the euro zone’s most indebted members.

headline.main: Rally Fizzles After Relief About Bailout Yields to Fears
headline.print_headline: Rally Fizzles After Relief About Bailout Yields to Fears
